news.title: Florence Road announce biggest headline show to date in Dublin
news.summary: They will play The Academy on November 6.

news.title: Bob Vylan and KNEECAP soar up the charts following Glastonbury sets
news.summary: "Ban Bob Vylan? The people said ‘Nah’. We need artists that speak up."

news.title: Former President Barack Obama to speak at Dublin event later this year
news.summary: The evening is described  as “an inspiring, once-in-a-lifetime event”  by organisers

news.title: LARAbEL - On Our Radar Q&A: "I’ve always been someone that needs space to think"
news.summary: LARAbEL on escapism, her Donegal roots, and her excellent new EP Squiggle.

news.title: Happy 85th Birthday Ringo Starr: "You know what I love to this day? The Beatles are still out there, and the music still holds up"
news.summary: As Ringo Starr celebrates his 85th birthday, we're rewinding it back to 2021 – when Hot Press was granted a virtual audience with the Beatles legend...

news.title: Tommy Cash announces Dublin show
